description:
Listen to even more remixed versions of classic Legend of Zeldaâ„¢ series tunes as you move to the beat with the Melody Pack DLC. A total of 39 additional tunes from 3 different artists are included!

With the Melody Pack you can designate which character and area will feature certain songs from both the original soundtrack and new remixes. Play through this rhythmic adventure to the beat of your own drum!
name: Cadence of Hyrule Melody Pack
